name: Domain of Blessing: Spring II
description:
The Ley Line Monolith inside this ancient Ley Line Altar is coveted by the monsters crowding the altar.
You shall earn priceless Artifacts if you protect the Ley Line Monolith from the monsters with the power of Electro.
disorder: When Overloaded is triggered, an Energy Blast will occur, dealing DMG to surrounding opponents.
